name: Northstrand Basin
culture_adjustments: stronger boat-house autonomy relative to state centers
stricter seasonal voyage taboos during fog/winter
oral chart variants kept as family-boat secrets
apprenticeships emphasize hull repair and augury integration
constraints: seasonal navigation blackout in dense fogs
notes: keeper-songs adapt charts to local tidal quirks
saltworks supply much of the state's preserved-fish trade
yards favor shallow-draft repair and lighters for transshipment
